participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is laid-back and enjoys the thrill of car culture. He has a humorous side but tends to be a bit reserved when it comes to personal relationships.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i have never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is nurturing and excited about her new journey into motherhood. She is optimistic and enjoys connecting with others as she adjusts to her new life.
participant_2.background: i just moved into my first home. i'm expecting triplets in three months. i work at a school. i recently moved to this country. a already have a step children.
